Main Page | Modules | Class Hierarchy | Alphabetical List | Data Structures | File List | Data Fields | Examples

mathematical operations
[scattered production points (ptask)]


Functions

void surfit::ptask_transform (REAL shiftX, REAL scaleX, REAL shiftY, REAL scaleY)
 makes geometrical transform on flow_ptask (shifting and scaling)
void surfit::ptask_inverse_transform (REAL shiftX, REAL scaleX, REAL shiftY, REAL scaleY)
 makes inverse to ptask_transform operation
bool surfit::ptask_filter_by_defarea ()
 removes points from flow_ptask, if surfit_defarea returns false for their coords
bool surfit::ptask_filter_by_func (REAL eps)
 removes points from flow_ptask, if |z - f(x,y)|>eps, where (x,y,z) - flow_ptask data points, f(x,y) - surfit_func value at point (x,y)
bool surfit::ptask_update_by_func ()
 sets points values to z = f(x,y), where (x,y,z) - flow_ptask data points, f(x,y) - surfit_func value at point (x,y)
REAL surfit::ptask_minx ()
 returns minimum X value of all data-points
REAL surfit::ptask_maxx ()
 returns maximum X value of all data-points
REAL surfit::ptask_miny ()
 returns minimum Y value of all data-points
REAL surfit::ptask_maxy ()
 returns maximum Y value of all data-points
REAL surfit::ptask_minz ()
 returns minimum Z value of all data-points
REAL surfit::ptask_maxz ()
 returns maximum Z value of all data-points
bool surfit::ptask_add_noise (REAL std)
 adds noise distributed as N(0,std) to flow_ptask
REAL surfit::ptask_mean ()
 calculates mean value of all data-points in flow_ptask
REAL surfit::ptask_std (REAL mean)
 calculates standart deviation from mean value of flow_ptask
bool surfit::ptask_plus (ptask *ptsk)
 calculates A = A+B, where A - this class, B - another ptask
bool surfit::ptask_minus (ptask *ptsk)
 calculates A = A-B, where A - this class, B - another ptask
bool surfit::ptask_mult (ptask *ptsk)
 calculates A = A*B, where A - this class, B - another ptask
bool surfit::ptask_div (ptask *ptsk)
 calculates A = A/B, where A - this class, B - another ptask
bool surfit::ptask_set (ptask *ptsk)
 calculates A = B, where A - this class, B - another ptask
bool surfit::ptask_plus_real (REAL val)
 calculates A = A+B, where A - this class, B - some numeric
bool surfit::ptask_minus_real (REAL val)
 calculates A = A-B, where A - this class, B - some numeric
bool surfit::ptask_mult_real (REAL val)
 calculates A = A*B, where A - this class, B - some numeric
bool surfit::ptask_div_real (REAL val)
 calculates A = A/B, where A - this class, B - some numeric
bool surfit::ptask_set_real (REAL val)
 calculates A = B, where A - this class, B - some numeric
